segments.text: Why are you so rude to your wife ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't like her butting in where I didn't want her . She's a chatter box .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But she means to help you , not to trouble you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But I just can't stand her butting in when I was trying to emphasize a point .
segments.speaker: S2
